MAME - 2 Player Multi-Mode

 
Pin
Mode 1
Players 1 & 2 MAME
Mode 2
Players 3 & 4 MAME
Key Function Key Function
A1 5 P1 Coin 7 P3 Coin
A2 1 P1 Start 3 P3 Start
A3 Right Arrow P1 Right END P3 Right
A4 Left Arrow P1 Left HOME P3 Left
A5 Up Arrow P1 Up PAGE UP P3 Up
A6 Down Arrow P1 Down PAGE DOWN P3 Down
A7 L-Ctrl P1 Button 1 R-Ctrl P3 Button 1
A8 L-Alt P1 Button 2 R-Shift P3 Button 2
A9 Space P1 Button 3 Enter P3 Button 3
A10 Enter Select P Pause
B1 6 P2 Coin 8 P4 Coin
B2 2 P2 Start 4 P4 Start
B3 G P2 Right Numpad-6 P4 Right
B4 D P2 Left Numpad-4 P4 Left
B5 R P2 Up Numpad-8 P4 Up
B6 F P2 Down Numpad-2 P4 Down
B7 A P2 Button 1 Numpad-0 P4 Button 1
B8 S P2 Button 2 Numpad-Decimal P4 Button 2
B9 Q P2 Button 3 Numpad-Enter P4 Button 3
B10 Esc Cancel Tab Config

Use HWB to toggle between the various modes. The active mode is remembered when KADE is powered off.
